name: 2K-tan
character_details: 2K-tan is the personification for Windows 2000 Professional, drawn as an intelligent and professional woman with short blue hair, glasses, and cat ear-shaped hairclips that flank a small white bonnet. Her outfit resembles a swimsuit in Windows logo colors, and she often acts as an older sister figure among the Windows-tans, known for her stability and dependability. She is often described as a guardian of ME-tan due to her greater stability compared to Windows ME.
